title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 

(Reception Conditions) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (reception conditions) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2021

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Reception Conditions)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Reception Conditions) 

Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 230 of 2018) is amended – 

in the definition of “applicant”, by the deletion of 

(a) 
“, subject to paragraph (2),”, 

in the definition of “recipient”, by the deletion of 

(b) 
“, subject to paragraphs (2) and (3),”, and 

(c) 

by the deletion of paragraphs (2) and (3). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 April, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

1 OJ No. L. 180, 29.06.2013, p.96 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [178] 3

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Communities (Reception Conditions) 
Regulations (S.I. No. 230 of 2018) to give further effect in Irish law to 
Directive 2013/33/EU of 26 June 2013. 

The Regulations delete paragraphs (2) and (3) from Regulation 2 of S.I. No. 
230 of 2018, which excluded from access to the labour market applicants for 
international protection the subject of notification of a transfer decision under 
Regulation 5(2) or an appeal under Regulation 16(2) of the European Union 
(Dublin System) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 62 of 2018). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [178]
